backend/main.mo: Motoko actor handling admin bootstrap, access control, user profiles, question CRUD, and quiz submissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence describing files and components involved in implementing the initial admin bootstrap UI flow.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files including hooks, components, pages, and layout modules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup with authentication-aware root component and role-based routing for admin and student areas.
frontend/src/components/admin/Initialize: Banner allowing the first authenticated non-admin user to claim initial admin access using token validation and confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/QuestionFo: Dialog form for creating or editing questions with option management, validation, and API integration.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button that reacts to authentication state and handles login errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their name.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Wraps the app with navigation, admin banner, and routed content container.
frontend/src/components/layout/RoleNavig: Renders navigation links based on user role with an account dropdown and logout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an actor tied to identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminBootstrap.ts: Provides hooks to check if an admin exists and to claim initial admin privileges.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Wraps Internet Identity login/logout and exposes authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerRole.ts: Fetches the callerâ€™s role from the backend and derives admin, student, or guest flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements the Internet Identity context with login, logout, and identity loading logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains query and mutation hooks for user profiles, questions, submissions, and related updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup and theme variables defining light/dark design tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up QueryClient and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDenied.tsx: Shows an access denied message and redirects users to their appropriate dashboard based on role.
Admin dashboard displaying question stats and links for managing questions and other admin tasks, with role-based access enforcement.
frontend/src/pages/admin/QuestionManagem: Provides CRUD management for questions, including listing, editing, deleting, and creating questions with admin-only access.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing page with branding, login button, and feature descriptions for admins and students.
frontend/src/pages/student/MyResults.tsx: Shows a student's submission history and performance metrics like best and average scores, restricted to student users.
frontend/src/pages/student/StudentDashbo: Student dashboard summarizing available questions and personal performance, with navigation to quizzes and submissions.
frontend/src/pages/student/TakeQuiz.tsx: Student quiz page that loads questions, tracks selected answers, submits them, and displays results.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file describing features, requirements, and architecture notes for the aptitude website.
